Resources

Textbook and Web pages:

James Stewart, Essential Calculus: Early Transcendentals, Brooks Cole, 2nd edition, 2012. (ISBN: 9781133112280).

  • Textbook page of student resources
  • MIT OpenCourseWare page (free online Calculus 3 video lectures – uses a different book)
  • Prof. Gilbert Strang’s book on Calculus (with video lectures)
  • Calculus.org (general resources and links to lots of helpful sites)
